sentences: Gerli Padar (born 6 November 1979) is an Estonian singer and actress.
She is the sister of Tanel Padar, who won the Eurovision Song Contest in 2001 for Estonia.
Padar represented Estonia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2007 with the song "Partners in Crime" which failed to qualify for the final.
In 2018, she competed in Eesti Laul 2018 together with Eliis PÃ¤rna with the song Taevas (performed in the semifinal in English as "Sky"), which came last in the final.
